Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Authentication › should return 403 when malformed token provided
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Authentication › should return 403 when expired token provided
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Success Cases › should return profile data with valid admin token via Authorization header
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Success Cases › should return profile data with valid admin token via cookie
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Success Cases › should return profile data with getProfile helper method
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Success Cases › should return profile data for regular user
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Security › should not expose sensitive information
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Security › should validate JWT token signature
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Security › should handle concurrent profile requests
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Integration › should work through Traefik proxy
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Integration › should be documented in API info
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Integration › should maintain consistent response format
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Error Handling › should handle network errors gracefully
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Error Handling › should return proper HTTP status codes
Profile API Endpoint Tests › Profile Endpoint Error Handling › should include appropriate CORS headers
